column4: Sorry, XORG crashed on me because of ... well what else, graphics problems. If anyone responded to my question about add/edit/remove of Dash applications, please respond again =)
fglrx is the only graphics driver available for me that 'works' ...
when you press the Dash button and type something
I installed some apps with Wine and some via tar.gz ... there's no way for me to add/edit/remove those netmk
I have to launch WhatPulse via terminal every time I start my computer ... that's silly.
try launching it a few times from ALT+F2
and yes I know how to edit "start up items" but apparently WhatPulse launches BEFORE the panel so it crashes because it needs panel
Yeah that works if I run it a FEW times ... seriously...?
if you run it from there a few times, I think you'll see it in the dashboard.
if you don't like Unity though, feel free to use another window manager
I like Unity. Just wondering if I can change an icon really is all I want to do. I want to add "WhatPulse" to the applications. Shouldn't be hard.
